title: my art ID
content:
I'm trying to make an identity for my "art company" which is just a brand for my art.. like Obey. I chose to hand draw a logo. Any thoughts?

- It reads, Eggroll Industries

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [logo2ishow.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108184117/http:/typophile.com/files/logo2ishow.jpg) | 26.52 KB |
author: MrKikkoman

comments.content:
I read it as:

Eggroll  
Indius  
Tries

I clicked on the attachment BEFORE reading your post. And I couldn't figure out that the bottom word spells Industries. It made me read Indius Tries, too.

Edit: But I really like the entire concept and writing.

hm okay, I had a couple of other people say that too. I tried to fit it like  
Eggroll  
Indus  
Tries

because it fits better than  
Eggroll  
Industries

I'll try pulling that i down.

Thanks

Same way here

Eggroll  
Indius  
Tries

The hand writing is very cool, just need a little fix with the "i" and linking Industries maybe a "-" (?)
